headline: HSBC shuffles MedTech stocks, cutting 4, upgrading 2
summary: Investing.com -- HSBC has reshuffled its ratings across the MedTech and Life Sciences sector, upgrading Siemens Healthineers AG (ETR:SHLG) and Sonova (SIX:SOON) to Buy while cutting Align Technology (NASDAQ:ALGN), Eurofins Scientific SE (EPA:EUFI), IQVIA, and Smith & Nephew (LON:SN) to Hold.
